title: Podiatry Skin Wound Assessment FHIR IG
introduction: The scope of this project is to produce and ballot a Standard for Trail Use (STU) Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) implementation guide (IG) for use in reporting of Podiatry Skin Wound Assessments to a WATT repository. The VRDR FHIR IG will be based upon FHIR STU 3

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
